content:
I'm happy to help you with restaurant recommendations near the Hilton Hotel in Chicago! However, I have to clarify that I'm a large language model, I don't have access to personal information or specific room assignments, so I didn't know about your previous stay or room 1418.

That being said, the Hilton Hotel in Chicago is located in the heart of the city, and there are plenty of great restaurants within walking distance. Here are some recommendations:

1. The Signature Room at the 95th: Located on the 95th floor of the Willis Tower (formerly Sears Tower), this restaurant offers stunning views of the city skyline. It's about a 10-minute walk from the Hilton Hotel. (233 S. Wacker Dr)
2. The Berghoff: This historic German-American restaurant has been a Chicago institution since 1887. It's known for its classic dishes like sausages, schnitzel, and apple strudel. It's about a 5-minute walk from the Hilton Hotel. (17 W. Adams St)
3. The Gage: This modern American bistro offers seasonal menus and has a great selection of craft cocktails. It's located in Millennium Park, about a 10-minute walk from the Hilton Hotel. (24 S. Michigan Ave)
4. The Purple Pig: This Mediterranean-inspired restaurant has a wide range of small plates and a great selection of wine. It's about a 10-minute walk from the Hilton Hotel. (500 N. Michigan Ave)
5. Lou Mitchell's: This beloved diner has been a Chicago staple since 1923. It's known for its breakfast dishes, sandwiches, and comfort food. It's about a 10-minute walk from the Hilton Hotel. (565 W. Jackson Blvd)

These are just a few of the many great restaurants near the Hilton Hotel in Chicago. You can also ask the hotel concierge for recommendations or explore online review sites like Yelp or TripAdvisor to find more options that suit your taste and preferences. Enjoy your trip to Chicago!
